name: ASA Computers
overview: ASA Computers offers a wide variety of engineering capabilities and has delivered products for the Data Center industry that include rack mounted servers, fully rack integrated large systems and industrial computing systems. We provide a systems level perspective to solve complex data center problems using innovative design and latest engineering techniques. Some Facts ASA Computers Has been serving IT industry for more than two decades with best of breed servers including rackmount server, blade server, vertulization server, modular server. We have served NASA, Fermilab, Caltech, Stanford University, MIT. We have (2) production facilities in Northern California totaling 31,000 sq. ft. We provide value-added services such as product certification and logistics in various countries as needed. We have (100) active OEM clients; largest client does 6,000 units annually ($100M in revenue).
